item.title: 279 Super Stylish Gifts
item.description: It’s hard to gift the girl who seemingly has everything. Maybe she’s your best friend, your sister, or your colleague two cubicles over whose name you drew in the class Secret Santa. But fear not, impossibly chic and impossible-to-shop-for pal. We’ve scoured the market for the perfect presents just for you, based on this season’s go-to trends. Among them: sequins that transition from day to night, denim in all shapes and sizes, and street graffiti styles that will leave you looking like a work of art. Click through to shop Teen Vogue’s ultimate fashion girl gift guide.

item.description: CuriosityStream is the world's first ad-free, on-demand streaming service for quality non-fiction programs that enlighten, entertain and inspire.
